name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kime Star' by NePoLaBo.
MC section in a clubroom setting where the members decide to start a band and discuss the band name.
NePoLaBo band performance of 'Ready!! Steady!! Derby!!'.

subtitles.original: 全部を欲しがれ EARTH女子！
subtitles.english: Want it all, Earth Girls!

subtitles.original: 全速かい そうかもそうかも 宇宙のスターにスターに
subtitles.english: Is it full power? Maybe so, maybe so. To be a star in the universe, a star

subtitles.original: なりたい？ なりたい？
subtitles.english: Do you want to be? Do you want to be?

subtitles.original: なれそう？なれそうだよ！
subtitles.english: Can we? We sure can!

subtitles.original: キマっちゃったしね！
subtitles.english: We totally nailed it!

subtitles.original: 全速モードでよいしょっしょ 制服はね無視だよ
subtitles.english: Heave-ho in full-power mode! Just ignore the uniforms.

subtitles.original: なんでもかんでもやっぱ 全力がいいよね
subtitles.english: After all, everything is better when you give it your all.

subtitles.original: 笑顔はリミ（リミ） 目顔はリミ（リミ）
subtitles.english: Smile is the limit, eye contact is the limit.

subtitles.original: 最強BIG BANG 狙っちゃえ未来！ チェストー！
subtitles.english: Go for the ultimate BIG BANG future! Chest-o!

subtitles.original: 手とりあったるんたった 怖くはないよね
subtitles.english: Holding hands, tra-la-la, it's not scary, right?

subtitles.original: 夢の計測メーターは 振り切れそうだよ
subtitles.english: The dream gauge is about to go off the charts!

subtitles.original: 地球から やってきたボクらは 本日も Go ahead! Go ahead!
subtitles.english: We, who came from Earth, are going ahead today too! Go ahead! Go ahead!

subtitles.original: 怒られるまで？
subtitles.english: ...Until we get scolded?

subtitles.original: …怒られても止まらないのです
subtitles.english: ...Even if we get scolded, we won't stop.

subtitles.original: 最後の最後もごめんんなさーい！
subtitles.english: Sorry until the very end!

subtitles.original: 先陣だれだい？ ボクらだい！
subtitles.english: Who's at the vanguard? We are!

subtitles.original: いわゆる前人ゼロの未踏地だよなあ もー１回っ！
subtitles.english: It's a frontier where no one has gone before! One more time!

subtitles.original: 大いなる一歩さ ボクらと最高速で ういっ！
subtitles.english: It's a giant leap, at top speed with us! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 前人ゼロの未踏地へ Go！！ そいやー！
subtitles.english: Go to the frontier where no one has gone before!! Soiya!

subtitles.original: よーし！次はバンドだ！できる曲を片っ端からやっていこう～！！
subtitles.english: Alright! Next is the band! Let's play every song we can, one by one!

subtitles.original: でもあたしたち、楽器できなくない……？
subtitles.english: But can we even play instruments...?

subtitles.original: こういうのはね、雰囲気っていうやつ！雰囲気が大事だから！頑張っている姿を見せれば、それでOK！
subtitles.english: It's all about the 'vibe'! The vibe is what matters! If we just show them we're doing our best, it'll be fine!

subtitles.original: バカにしといて結局やるのね……
subtitles.english: You're making fun of it, but we're doing it anyway...

subtitles.original: じゃあまず、誰が何やるのか決めよう～！ねねはギターっ！！
subtitles.english: Then first, let's decide who's playing what! Nene is on guitar!!

subtitles.original: じゃあししろんはドラムかな～
subtitles.english: Then Shishiron will do drums, I guess~

subtitles.original: ポルカは、あ、ベースで～！
subtitles.english: Polka will be, oh, on bass~!

subtitles.original: じゃあラミィは、シンセ、やろうかなっ
subtitles.english: Then Lamy will... maybe do synth.

subtitles.original: そうしたら演出も考えないとね～
subtitles.english: Then we also need to think about the stage effects.

subtitles.original: 派手にドカーン！ってしたい！！
subtitles.english: I want to do a big 'KABOOM'!

subtitles.original: ざっくりだなあ～
subtitles.english: That's pretty vague~

subtitles.original: サビにキャノンとか出す？
subtitles.english: Should we set off cannons during the chorus?

subtitles.original: いいね！照明もレーザー出したりとかでピカピカにしていこう！
subtitles.english: Nice! Let's make it flashy with lasers and lights too!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ねねはポルカと動き回ってパフォーマンスしよう！
subtitles.english: Then Nene and Polka will run around and perform!

subtitles.original: やるやる！任せてー！！
subtitles.english: I'll do it! Leave it to me!!

subtitles.original: だ、大丈夫か？間に合わなくてあたふたするんじゃない？
subtitles.english: A-Are you sure? Aren't you going to panic when you can't keep up?

subtitles.original: まあ、それもあたしたちらしさってことで～
subtitles.english: Well, that's just part of our style~

subtitles.original: ノリでなんとかなるなる！
subtitles.english: We'll manage with the flow!

subtitles.original: あ、そうだ、バンド名、どうするの？
subtitles.english: Oh, right. What about the band name?

subtitles.original: えー、かっこいいやつがいいなー！！
subtitles.english: Hmm, I want something cool!!

subtitles.original: じゃあ……青春★ピチピチフルスロットル団！！
subtitles.english: Then... 'Youthful Bouncy Full Throttle Troupe'!!

subtitles.original: ……ださきっ！？
subtitles.english: ...Lame!?

subtitles.original: もうちょい5期生要素も入れたいね。ラーメン、芝刈り機、低気圧……
subtitles.english: I want to add more 5th-gen elements. Ramen, lawnmower, low pressure...

subtitles.original: 『カブトムシ』って入れたらカッコいいよ！！
subtitles.english: It'll be cool if we add 'Beetle'!

subtitles.original: 青春低気圧★ラーメンピチピチフルスロットル芝刈り機団！！
subtitles.english: 'Youthful Low-Pressure Ramen Bouncy Full Throttle Lawnmower Troupe'!!

subtitles.original: 混ぜるな、ぐちゃぐちゃだよ……
subtitles.english: Don't mix them together, it's a mess...

subtitles.original: じゃあラミィちゃんは何がいいの？
subtitles.english: Then what would you suggest, Lamy-chan?

subtitles.original: え～、やっぱり可愛いのいいかなぁ～。『ねぽらぼハーモニー』とか♪
subtitles.english: Hmm, I think something cute would be nice. Like 'Nepolabo Harmony'♪

subtitles.original: それでいいのかラミィ
subtitles.english: Are you sure about that, Lamy?

subtitles.original: カッコよくないよラミィ
subtitles.english: That's not cool, Lamy.

subtitles.original: 俺、恥ずかしいよラミィ
subtitles.english: I'm embarrassed for you, Lamy.

subtitles.original: ほんっとに……お前らっ！！
subtitles.english: Seriously... you guys!!

subtitles.original: よ～～し！バンド名も決まったし、やってみますかー！！
subtitles.english: Alright! The band name is decided, so let's do this!!

subtitles.original: これで学寮祭の注目はいただきだーっ！！
subtitles.english: With this, we'll be the highlight of the festival!!

subtitles.original: えっ！？あれでいくの！？
subtitles.english: What!? We're going with that!?

subtitles.original: いくぞー！よーい！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Ready...

subtitles.original: どんっ！！
subtitles.english: Bang!!

subtitles.original: Ready!! Steady!! Derby!!
subtitles.english: Ready!! Steady!! Derby!!

subtitles.original: 走って 走って 憧れを越えて
subtitles.english: Run, run, beyond our dreams

subtitles.original: Ready!!
subtitles.english: Ready!!

subtitles.original: Steady!!
subtitles.english: Steady!!

subtitles.original: Derby!!
subtitles.english: Derby!!

subtitles.original: まだ見たことのない スピードの向こう側へ
subtitles.english: To the other side of speed that we've never seen before

subtitles.original: ウォームアップは完璧さ
subtitles.english: The warm-up is perfect

subtitles.original: 地球をほら 踏み込む蹄鉄
subtitles.english: Look, the horseshoes stepping on the Earth

subtitles.original: ゴール前のキセキ
subtitles.english: A miracle before the goal

subtitles.original: 仕掛ける場所は最終コーナー
subtitles.english: The place to make our move is the final corner

subtitles.original: あとは行けるところまで 息を切らしてたい
subtitles.english: Then, I want to keep going as far as I can until I'm out of breath

subtitles.original: 何万と手を叩くオーディエンス
subtitles.english: Tens of thousands of audience members clapping their hands

subtitles.original: 割れんばかり響く大歓声
subtitles.english: Thunderous cheers echoing all around

subtitles.original: ファンファーレが鳴る
subtitles.english: The fanfare sounds

subtitles.original: 心音が高鳴る
subtitles.english: My heart beats faster

subtitles.original: 動き出す秒針 夢のゲートが開く
subtitles.english: The second hand starts moving, the gate of dreams opens

subtitles.original: いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 走って！ 走って！
subtitles.english: Run! Run!

subtitles.original: 憧れを追い越して
subtitles.english: Surpass our dreams

subtitles.original: 次は誰の番だ！？
subtitles.english: Whose turn is next!?

subtitles.original: さあ目指すはスーパースター
subtitles.english: Now, aim to be a superstar
